entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 13 Aug 2023 14:01:17
entry.summary:
Tech:
- AI-powered app allows users to 'text' with Jesus
- AI can help predict air quality, but not wildfires
- Researchers propose UniversalNER AI model with improved accuracy
- Doctor GPT, a language model that can pass the US Medical Licensing Exam
- Researchers propose a novel text-to-image association test tool

Business:
- Dear SaaStr: How Long Do You Have as an SDR/BDR if You Arenâ€™t Hitting your Quota?
- Cruise blames Outside Lands for driverless car traffic fiasco
- NixOS RFC 136 approved for repository structure
- Freshpaint is hiring engineers for a HIPAA compliant data platform
- Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp criticizes Trump over loyalty pledge

AI:
- AI-powered app allows users to 'text' with Jesus
- AI can help predict air quality, but not wildfires
- Researchers propose UniversalNER AI model with improved accuracy
- Doctor GPT, a language model that can pass the US Medical Licensing Exam
- Moderation on AI image generator can be easily circumvented

Other:
- How to spot fireballs at the Perseid meteor shower's peak
- Monorepo vs Microrepo: Choosing the best repository structure
- You can win $50,000 if you successfully hack a US government satellite
- Problems with 'first name' and 'last name' fields in data
- ML is not useful for predicting scientific replicability
- Wordle #785 hints and answer for Sunday, August 13th
- Venus exhibiting unique behavior this weekend
- Next big meteor shower could have a huge 'outburst'
- Madden 24: 13 things to know about this year's game
- iPhone 14, 14 Pro owners complain about falling battery capacity
- My Exam Experience - AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (AWS SAA-C03)
- James Carville dismisses concerns about Democrats' presidential bench
- Report finds moderation on AI image generator can be easily circumvented

Insights:
- AI has diverse applications, from conversational apps to predicting air quality and medical licensing exam preparation.
- Repository structure choices can impact code management and development processes.
- Concerns about data fields and scientific replicability highlight the importance of data quality and research rigor.
- Meteor showers and gaming releases generate excitement and interest.
- Political dynamics and loyalty pledges can impact political races.
- The circumvention of AI image generator moderation raises concerns about misinformation and conspiracy theories.
